meanings.sent1: I found two nickles in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: She used a nickle to buy a piece of candy.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine wouldn't accept my nickles, only quarters.
meanings.sent4: His collection of nickles shone like little silver stars.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nickles clinking together is music to my ears.

meanings.definition: To make a small cut or notch in something
meanings.sent1: Carefully, he nickles the wood to create a design.
meanings.sent2: She nickles the paper to make it easier to tear.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally nickles his finger while sharpening the pencil.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor nickles away at the marble to reveal the hidden figure within.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly nickles the vegetables for garnish.
